steps.1: Add-1/4 teaspoon of red chilli powder to the bowl
steps.3: whisk-In a mixing bowl, whisk 1 cup of chilled curd until smooth. Use fresh homemade or packaged curd
steps.4: Add-1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.5: chop or grate-chop or grate the cucumber
steps.6: Combine-Combine all the ingredients in the bowl
steps.7: add-add 1 tablespoon of chopped cilantro leaves to the bowl
steps.8: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of cumin powder to the bowl
steps.10: Add-Add the chopped or grated cucumber to the whisked curd
steps.11: Add-1/2 teaspoon of chaat masala powder to the bowl
